amendment.description: To provide a report on the use of data to Congress.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3733 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3733 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S10541-10543) To provide a report on the use of data to Congress.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3733 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3733 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Wyden.
